articles.title: Govinda's manager clarifies on reports of actor's Rs 1,000 crore online Ponzi scam - India Today
articles.description: The Odisha Economic Offences Wing (EOW) had said that they will question Govinda in connection with a Rs 1,000 crore online Ponzi scam probe. Govinda's manager has now reacted to the reports.
articles.content: On September 13, the Odisha Economic Offences Wing (EOW) said that they will question Govinda in connection with a pan-India online Ponzi scam probe of Rs 1,000 crore. The authorities said that the S… [+2940 chars]
